responseText: NSLOCTEXT("[70199B914E7E03A9706A1499CF20B1FD]", "6BCC208643F90016031079A5A64A2542", "I recall a reference to it on a hidden tablet in the lowlands. It\'s at the other Circle of Stones where I met you last. If we are to piece together the origin of the scion\'s gift, it\'s imbued power, and how to harness it, we\'ll have to meet back there at the site of funerals.")
name: CSQ_DialDef_0014_AkhundBahrani_AstralCircle_124
